text_block_list.text:
For a trainer without an Umamusume, the best course of action 
is to familiarize oneself with them in the meantime.
choice_data_list: (Time to give it my all observing today too!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff, huff…!

When I arrived at the training grounds, I saw Agnes Digital 
running on the dirt track.

She pushed against the dirt with impressive strength, despite 
her small size. 
In a mere flash, she was already rushing down the final straight.
choice_data_list:
(She looks pretty used to it… Has she 
already debuted?)

(She looks pretty used to it… Has she 
already debuted?)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Whew…

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Good work, Agnes Digital-san! You were on point today too! 
Keep it up, and you're in good shape for the Selection Race!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Huh…!? 
The… Selection Race…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
That's kind of… Er… 
Sorry, I need some time to think about it…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: A-Anyway, I'm off to the turf track now…!

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text: Ah… right, see you later! Don't push yourself too hard, all right?

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Training that hard on turf and dirt tracks every day? That's twice 
as much work as the other girls. …It's really impressive.

This time, she took off onto the turf. I was taken aback by how 
nimbly she ran. Even though I was so sure that she'd specialized 
in running on dirt——

I took her time with a stopwatch, just out of curiousity, and 
when I saw her time, my eyes went wide.
She was a great runner on dirt and turf. But from what I overheard, she hadn't even run in the Selection Race, much less debuted.

I wanted to know what was going on, so I made my way down to 
the track to hear it from her.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Hoo-whee～… 
As always, the track after Umamusume-chans finish running is 
just THE BEST!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
If I keep this up, I'll have the best seat in the house no matter 
what kind of race it is! 
Mufufu, there's my virtuous deed for the day!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but that was cutting it pretty close… Almost went and signed 
up for the Selection Race. I'd never be able to live that down～.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't. I'm still mad at myself for almost making such a 
puffed-rice-brained decisio——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Wait, HUH!? What…!? Whom…!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's just you. The Umamusume-chan fan from the other day. 
Hello, hello～.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: So, how've you been? You been doing those virtuous deeds?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I'm still out here living my worshipful life. Saying grace to my faves. Giving thanks for the bounty of their moe. Sometimes I get so emotional I just start to cry——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
——Wait, not now!! 
Did you. Hear that first bit…!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah. Knew it. So you heard me…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
It shouldn't be too hard to explain, if you can bear with me going 
delulu about my faves…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I just can't choose between turf and dirt. 
Sure, part of the problem comes from my 50-50 skillset, but——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
The real issue's that picking one means abandoning the other. 
I reeeeaaa——lly don't want to have to do that…

When it comes to Central races, the higher the grade, the more 
likely it'll be on turf. So the majority of Umamusume forgo dirt to 
get better at running on turf.
Most Umamusume would just say "it is what it is", but she——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Yes, but of course! My love for Umamusume-chan knows not 
turf nor dirt! For all they are all my faves, and pwecious all the 
same!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
No, yeah. That's the thing of it! 
They're all so pwecious I just can't choose!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Yes, exactly! Surely a karmic veteran like you would understand! 
They're all pwecious!! BUT…!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: If I go for turf, I can't go see Umamusume-chans on dirt! If I go for dirt, I can't go see Umamusume-chans on turf!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Ghaahhh, how is this even a thing? All because of this, I've said 
no to every scouting, every Selection Race!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: E・ven・though・I want to see aaaaaa——aaalll the Umamusume-chans up close, turf AND dirt!!!!

…Somehow, I get the feeling we're having two very different 
conversations here.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: You understand this pain, don't you!? Don't you, Umamusume-chan-loving trainer?

She was kind of talking up a storm, so I got her to stop for a 
second so I could figure things out…

She didn't want to give up on either dirt or turf Umamusume 
——her "faves". 
But if she wanted to debut, she'd have to pick one or the other.

But she couldn't make that choice, and ended up refusing 
everyone who tried to scout her… That's the gist of it.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Ha… If it was more obvious which tracks I'm better at, that'd 
make things a whole lot easier to figure out…

She didn't have a good reason to choose one or the other. 
So maybe it'd be better to actually do something instead of 
just thinking about it. Maybe——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …Huh? Them…?

Looking down at the track, it just so happened that TM. Opera O, 
Overlord of Turf, and Smart Falcon, the Ruler of Dirt, were there.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ……Bwuh?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: WHHAAAAA!? Ask her Overlordship and her Umadolshipーーー!!?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, are the two of you… 
…Perhaps admirers of mine?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Very well then. If you want a photoshoot, a deep cut, an 
interview, I shall give it all to you!
choice_data_list: Why is it that you run on turf?
Why is it that you run on turf?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, quite the thinker, that question. But the answer is simple! 
You see—— I merely stand where the spotlight shines brightest 
upon me!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? You're… Digital-chan, right? 
Thanks so much for coming to my concert last time～!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe you came to see me on the track, too♪ 
You really wanted to see little old Falco that much?
choice_data_list: We wanted to know why you run on dirt.
We wanted to know why you run on dirt.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hm? You want to know why I run on dirt? Hmm～… 
Because "if only Falco can do it, she's got to do her best!" ☆

Those are the answers we got from the two of them. 
They didn't put it the same way, but they meant the same thing. 
They ran on the tracks that made them shine the brightest.
So, when it comes to Agnes Digital——
choice_data_list: So what do you think now?
So what do you think now?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
『——and Confucius replied, the virtue of the superior as wind 
upon the grass.』

And with those last words, she passed right out. 
This was another shape of her love for Umamusume… maybe?
